column5: Hey guys, we are flying into Eddie North's June 22nd. We will be staying in Sault Ste Marie Michigan or Ontario on the 20th. We are looking for a good place to eat and a decent hotel to stay at on either side of the border. Our preferences are as follows: 1.) Restaurant that serves alcohol, and 2.) Within walking distance of the hotel. We have read on here about Antlers and Boston Pizza, but are familiar with neither or the area in general. Thanks in advance, John

Last time we were up to the Soo, we stayed at the Park Inn. It was one of only a few places that had rooms available on Labor Day weekend. Everyone was up there for the Mackinac Bridge walk. Hotel was adequate and there were several restaurants in walking distance.

I would go with the Days Inn soo michigan. Clean rooms, pool & hot tub, and nice little free breakfast. Right across the parking lot is Studebakers restaurant & lounge, with several other places relatively close by. http://www.daysinn.com/hotels/michig...hotel-overview
Thanks U. P. ! Will definitely look into it!John
